resources.string: Please click Image for Description of Services
If you are seeing this message, it means the click event failed and the user must restart the application.

PC Services include diagnosing computer hardware and software issues, recommendations for preventing future problems, and installing hardware and software. Parts will require an additional charge for the cost of parts only installation is included in the original fee price.

Phone Application development includes initial User Interface design and mock-up drafts. Full application design and implementation, including planning, design, implementation, testing, and publishing. Maintenance is provided free for six months after the application goes live.

Web Application development includes a fully functional web application complete with navigation, charts, graphs, database integration, server design and domain hosting. Maintenance is provided free for six months after the application goes live.

A basic web page consists of static pages with information and simple graphics. The page can implement form submission such as a contact form or user registration. This type of website is best suited for a blog, e-commerce or informational pages.
Description of Server and Database Services

Server and Database services include maintaining existing hardware and software as well as installing new hardware and integrating the hardware with the rest of the system. Services also include maintenance and fixes if a server or database goes down.
